verbose_text: The transcript expression levels of the housekeeping genes 18S rRNA and GAPDH were significantly affected by ethanol fixation and/or NeuroTrace staining treatments : the percentages of transcripts retained for each experimental setting were as follows (mean +/- SEM) : NeuroTrace staining without ethanol fixation, 11 +/- 7% (18S rRNA) and 11 +/- 5% (GAPDH); ethanol fixation without NeuroTrace staining, 29 +/- 9% (18S rRNA) and 27 +/- 8% (GAPDH); a combination of ethanol fixation and NeuroTrace staining, 32 +/- 9% (18S rRNA), 32 +/- 9% (GAPDH).
